statements: SELECT * FROM CropWaterConsumption
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM CropWaterConsumption
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE water_consumption > 50
SELECT * FROM CropWaterConsumption ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE crop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE water_consumption > 100 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE crop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE water_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT crop_name, SUM(water_consumption) AS total_water_consumption FROM CropWaterConsumption GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_water_consumption > 500
SELECT * FROM CropWaterConsumption WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%'
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_id, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE water_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data WHERE irrigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT crop_name, water_used FROM crops INNER JOIN irrigation_data ON crops.crop_id = irrigation_data.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE water_consumption > 100;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, irrigation_date FROM crops JOIN irrigation_data ON crops.crop_id = irrigation_data.crop_id WHERE irrigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(water_consumption) AS avg_water_consumption FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(water_used) AS total_water_used FROM crops JOIN irrigation_data ON crops.crop_id = irrigation_data.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_water_used > 500;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT crop_name, water_required FROM Crop;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location FROM Farm ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT data_id, crop_id, farm_id, crop_yield FROM CropData WHERE crop_yield > 100;
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE water_used < 50 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE water_required > 10.0;
SELECT crop_name, water_required FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT c.crop_name, cd.crop_yield FROM Crop c JOIN CropData cd ON c.crop_id = cd.crop_id WHERE cd.crop_yield > 500;
SELECT c.crop_name, f.farm_name, cd.crop_yield, cd.water_used FROM Crop c JOIN CropData cd ON c.crop_id = cd.crop_id JOIN Farm f ON cd.farm_id = f.farm_id WHERE cd.water_used < 1000;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE water_consumption > 100;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE water_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE crop_name LIKE 'R%';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT crop_id, irrigation_date, irrigation_amount FROM irrigation WHERE irrigation_amount > 10;
SELECT * FROM weather WHERE temperature < 30 AND humidity > 60;
SELECT crop_name, start_date, end_date, avg_water_consumption FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE crop_id = 3 ORDER BY avg_water_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_details;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crop_details WHERE water_consumption > 100;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM field_details ORDER BY field_area DESC;

SELECT crop_name, field_name, irrigation_date, water_used FROM crop_details JOIN field_details ON crop_details.crop_id = field_details.crop_id JOIN irrigation_logs ON field_details.field_id = irrigation_logs.field_id;
SELECT source_name, flow_rate FROM water_source WHERE water_type = 'River' ORDER BY flow_rate ASC;
SELECT crop_name, water_consumption FROM crop_details WHERE water_consumption > 100 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM field_details WHERE field_area <= 50 ORDER BY field_area DESC;
SELECT log_id, irrigation_date, water_used FROM irrigation_logs WHERE irrigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, recommended_water, start_date, end_date FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE recommended_water >= 200 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, water_type, flow_rate FROM water_source WHERE water_type = 'River' ORDER BY flow_rate DESC;
